CARNESS analysis package 20150424.001 documentation

initializator Module¶

This script concerns all the aspect of the creation and the initialization of artificial catalytic reaction networks in th format requested by the CARNESS simulation platform. To have a description of all the parameters admitted by the initializator plase digit:

python <path>/initializator.py -h
